# code4life workshop

This is the repository for the code4life workshop held in Warsaw. 

# Requirements

- A github account
- R and RStudio
- Shinyapps.io account

## R and RStudio 

In this workshop we will use R and RStudio, therefore they need to be installed in your local machines. 

You can get R [here](https://cran.r-project.org/) and RStudio [here](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download). 

## GitHub account

Every participant should have a GitHub account ready for the workshop. Setting one up is easy and straightforward. Just go to [github.com](github.com) and follow the steps.
